
# Page 12: Step 3 - Download Responses

Connect to FormIO and fetch submissions for the selected form. You can include drafts or deleted records if needed.

## What you will be asked

You will see a short prompt with a recommended default. Press Enter to
accept the default or provide a new value if you need to change it.

## Why this step matters

This step keeps your workflow consistent and makes the output easier to
share and reproduce across runs.

## Tips

- Use stable credentials or environment variables
- Include drafts only if analysis requires them
- Large downloads may take time depending on form size
